Title: Elam Ferguson
Writer: Joe Gayton (creator), Tony Gayton (creator), Mark Richard, Tom Brady, Tom Brady (story editor), Michael C. Martin (staff writer), Jimmy Mero (staff writer)
Actors: Anson Mount, Colm Meaney, Common, Robin McLeavy
Plot: Durant seeks revenge for his attack. Bear Killer (Elam) returns to Cheyenne trying to sell the female slaves he has. Due to Campbells presence, Cullen and Eva attempt to convince Elam of where he is and what will happen if he sell slaves.
